ClinicalDocument.title: Community Health and Hospitals: Health Summary(Example)

tr.td: 59 YO white female with a 15 year history of diabetes and a 10 year history of hypertension. Has early coronary artery disease and COPD. Not well controlled on Furosemide and Propranolol. Will increase doses and council on weight reduction, exercise and diet.

60 YO white female with a 11 year history of hypertension. Improved control on current levels of Furosemide and Propranolol. Will increase Furosemide dose and council on weight reduction, exercise and diet.

62 YO white female with a 12 year history of hypertension. Reasonable control on current levels of Furosemide and Propranolol. Concerned about reduced pulmonary function. Will refer to Dr. Jones for further evaulation.
